About Me

I am a Producer, Mixing Engineer and Musician from India. Having produced several singles, ranging from Bollywood to Progressive Rock, I have more than 5 years of experience in recording, composing, arranging as well as mixing and mastering records for satisfied clients.

I am also part of Fidelity, playing the role of Rhythm Guitarist and Backing Vocalist for more than a year.
